page.title: 16CULTER/MILLTIMBER SCHOOLS.
page.content: {EDUCATION} The subjects at the two schools were very similar.In the morning they did ordinary work like maths,English and reading,while in the afternoon they did subjects such as drama,games,art and work on their projects. {SPORT} The two schools strongly believed in sport in one form or another.They both had gym once a week and games as well. {EXERCISE} Pupils thought sport was good because it helped to keep them fit and it gave them a break from school work,which they were glad to get a rest from! {TEACHERS} Most of the teachers were female.There were 20 teachers at Culter and 7 at Milltimber. BY MHAIRI DUFF,ANNA BERTRAM, ROISIN FARRINGTON.
